Class_Skill_Desc_Breath of the Earth: Restores 60% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dosis: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170
Class_Skill_Desc_Dosis II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170
Class_Skill_Desc_Dosis III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 2,000
Class_Skill_Desc_Druochole: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 600</br>Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP</br>Addersgall Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Dyskrasia: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170
Class_Skill_Desc_Dyskrasia II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 170 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170
Class_Skill_Desc_Egeiro: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasia: Upgrades Dosis III to Eukrasian Dosis III.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect expires upon executing Eukrasian Dosis III.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasian Diagnosis: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 300</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 180％ of the amount of HP restored. When critical HP is restored, also grants Differential Diagnosis, nullifying damage equaling 180% the amount of HP restored.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Eukrasian Prognosis or scholar's Galvanize.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasian Dosis: Deals unaspected damage over time.</br>Potency: 40</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasian Dosis II: Deals unaspected damage over time.</br>Potency: 60</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasian Dosis III: Deals unaspected damage over time.</br>Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Eukrasian Diagnosis to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Eukrasian Diagnosis Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 15s</br>Grants Addersting when barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Toxikon changes to Toxikon II while under the effect of Addersting.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eukrasian Prognosis: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 320% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with those of Eukrasian Diagnosis or scholar's Galvanize.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Haima: Erects a magicked barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 300 potency.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Haimatinon</br>Duration: 15s</br>When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Haimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.</br>When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.</br>Cure Potency: 150 per remaining stack of Haimatinon
Class_Skill_Desc_Healing Wind: Restores 25% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Holos: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 300</br>Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Icarus: Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Unable to cast if bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ixochole: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP</br>Addersgall Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Kardia: Grants self the effect of Kardia and a selected party member or self the effect of Kardion, granting the additional effects of Dosis III and Eukrasian Dosis III when these spells are cast.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kerachole: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Taurochole.</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s</br>//Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP</br>Addersgall Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Krasis: Increases HP recovery via healing actions for a party member or self by 20%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Mesotes: Erects a magicked barrier at a select location, granting party members the effect of Mesotes and afflicting enemies with the effect of Lype when standing inside.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Mesotes Effect: Negates all damage from enemies who are not under the effect of Lype</br>Duration: 5s</br>Lype Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 8,000</br>Duration: 5s</br>The barrier can be relocated once before its effect expires, but the effect duration will not be reset.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 120s
Class_Skill_Desc_Panhaima: Erects a magicked barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 200 potency.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Panhaimatinon</br>Duration: 15s</br>When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Panhaimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.</br>When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.</br>Cure Potency: 100 per remaining stack of Panhaimatinon
Class_Skill_Desc_Pepsis: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members by removing Eukrasian Diagnosis and Eukrasian Prognosis effects granted by you.</br>Eukrasian Diagnosis Cure Potency: 450</br>Eukrasian Prognosis Cure Potency: 350</br>Targets not under the effect of Eukrasian Diagnosis or Eukrasian Prognosis will not be healed.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phlegma: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 400 for the first enemy, and 30% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phlegma II: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 490 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you</br>Cure Potency: 170</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phlegma III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 10,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Physis: Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Physis II: Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 130</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Increases HP recovered by healing actions by 10%</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Pneuma: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Haima and 4 stacks of Haimatinon to self and all party members within 20 yalms</br>Haima Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 3,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Haimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.</br>When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.</br>Cure Potency: 3,000 per remaining stack of Haimatinon</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Prognosis: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 300
Class_Skill_Desc_Repose: Afflicts target with Sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rescue: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Soteria: Grants 4 stacks of Soteria, each stack increasing the cure potency of Kardion effects granted by you by 70%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Taurochole: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 700</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Kerachole.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP</br>Addersgall Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Toxikon: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 2,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 6s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>※Action changes to Toxikon II while under the effect of Addersting.
Class_Skill_Desc_Toxikon II: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 8,000 for the first enemy, and 2,000 for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 6s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Addersting.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Zoe: Increases healing magic potency of your next healing spell by 50%.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Status_Desc_Eukrasian Diagnosis: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Eukrasian Prognosis: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Haima: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Kardia: Triggers additional effects on a player under the effect of Kardion granted by you when casting certain attack magic.
Class_Status_Desc_Krasis: HP recovery via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Mesotes: Negating all damage from enemies not under the effect of Lype.
Class_Status_Desc_Panhaima: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Soteria: The healing potency of Kardia is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: Next spell will require no time to cast.
Class_Status_Desc_Zoe: Healing magic potency of next spell cast is increased.
Class_Trait_Desc_Addersgall: Grants 1 stack of Addersgall automatically every twenty seconds.</br>Maximum Stacks: 3</br>Can be charged outside of combat.
Class_Trait_Desc_Addersting: Grants 1 stack of Addersting when the barrier granted by Eukrasian Diagnosis to any party member or the barrier granted by Eukrasian Prognosis to self is completely absorbed.</br>Maximum Stacks: 3
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Healing Magic: Increases the healing potency of Diagnosis to 450 and Kardia to 170. Also increases the strength of barriers granted by Eukrasian Diagnosis to 180% the amount of HP restored, and Eukrasian Prognosis to 320% the amount of HP restored.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Kerachole: Adds an additional effect to Kerachole that grants healing over time.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Zoe: Reduces Zoe recast time to 90 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Offensive Magic Mastery: Upgrades Dosis to Dosis II, Phlegma to Phlegma II, and Eukrasian Dosis to Eukrasian Dosis II. Also increases the potency of Toxikon to 300.
Upgrades Dosis II to Dosis III, Phlegma II to Phlegma III, Eukrasian Dosis II to Eukrasian Dosis III, Dyskrasia to Dyskrasia II, and Toxikon to Toxikon II.
Class_Trait_Desc_Somanoutic Oath: Increases the potency of Dosis to 250, Phlegma to 330, and Eukrasian Dosis to 35.
Class_Trait_Desc_Somanoutic Oath II: Increases the potency of Dosis to 300, Phlegma to 400, and Eukrasian Dosis to 40.
